lead_paragraph: A Texas grand jury indicted Trooper Brian Encinia, who arrested Sandra Bland, the Chicago-area woman who days later was found dead in her jail cell.

byline.contributor: Manny Fernandez contributed reporting from Trinidad, Tex.

snippet: A Texas grand jury indicted Trooper Brian Encinia, who arrested Sandra Bland, the Chicago-area woman who days later was found dead in her jail cell.

headline.main: Texas Trooper Who Arrested Sandra Bland Is Charged With Perjury
headline.print_headline: Texas Trooper Is Charged With Perjury in Jail Death

abstract: Brian T Encinia, Texas state trooper who arrested Sandra Bland, black woman later found dead in prison cell, is indicted on charges of perjury; charge stems from affidavit filed by Encinia claiming he removed Bland from her car to conduct traffic investigation more safely, statement grand jury found false.
